    • –î–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É, –ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å —Ä–µ—Ç—Ä–æ—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –∏–Ω—Ü–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤;
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Å—Ä–µ–¥ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–∞.

    –ü—Ä–∏–≥–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è: –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ–ø—Ü–∏–∏ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã;

    –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–∑–æ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π (–Ω–∞—à–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã —Ä–∞–∑–±—Ä–æ—Å–∞–Ω—ã –ø–æ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–º –î–¶, –ø–æ—ç—Ç–æ–º—É –º—ã –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º bgp/ospf/vpn);

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ Kubernetes;
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ Infracture as Code;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Terraform;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ë–î 1-10–¢–ë (–∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤, —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏–π, –∑–∞–¥–∞–Ω–∏–π, –≤–æ—Ä–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ —Ç.–ø.);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è 1–°;

    –ú—ã —Ü–µ–Ω–∏–º —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –ö–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è —Ç—Ä—É–¥–∞ (–±–µ–ª–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞, –æ–∫–ª–∞–¥, –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏);
    • –ì—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã ‚Äì —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–π, –Ω–æ —Å –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–º –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–æ–º; –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–∞ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–∞—è —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞
    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ;
    • –ö–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –µ–¥–∏–Ω–æ–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤: —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞–º–∏ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö –ë—Ä—è–Ω—Å–∫–∞, –ï–∫–∞—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–Ω–±—É—Ä–≥–∞, –û–º—Å–∫–∞.


  42. –í–µ–¥—É—â–∏–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ Python (Team Lead) ("–¢–µ–ª–µ–ø–æ—Ä—Ç", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) map[currency:RUR from:250000 gross:false to:300000] [ 2021-05-07 ]

    –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –∏ —è–¥—Ä–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã
    • –ü—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç–∏–µ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π
    • –ù–∞—Ä–µ–∑–∫–∞ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –Ω–∞ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤
    • –í–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ —Å DevOps
    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–Ω–æ–π –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –æ—Ç 2 –ª–µ—Ç
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –æ—Ç 5 –ª–µ—Ç –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ Agile-–ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ —Å –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–æ–π –∏ RESTful API
    • –¢–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π —Å—Ç–µ–∫: Python 3.6+, RabbitMQ, DRF, ELK

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    • –í –±—É—Ä–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—é—â–∏–π—Å—è –ª–æ–≥–∏—Å—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π IoT-–ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—ã—Å–∫–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏–π Python —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫.
    • –£ –Ω–∞—Å –Ω–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –∏ –¥—Ä—É–∂–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤, –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏.
    • –ü—è—Ç–∏–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—è
    • –ù–∞—á–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è –≤ 10 –∏–ª–∏ –≤ 11
    • –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞
    • –û—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§


  43. Senior Azure DevOps Engineer, Fintech Solutions ("DataArt", –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...re are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues; The ability t...

    About the vacancy

    DataArt‚Äôs client is a fintech firm from the US. It is focused on mortgage loans and services around it. To ensure multiple internal and external services‚Äô availability and reliability, our clients started moving their workloads to the cloud.

    DataArt was engaged to support the client in their cloud journey. Currently, our experts are working in close collaboration with the onsite team to set up the cloud governance, establish the best cloud DevOps practices. DataArt team is involved in multiple projects: from disaster recovery environments set up for the business-critical applications to the migration of large workloads or deploying them in the cloud as greenfield solutions. Although the primary focus of the client is on AWS, the client is looking for a DevOps engineer with strong Azure expertise to manage the infrastructure deployed there and make it compliant with the corporate and industry standards.

    Main Stack: Azure (multiple services), IaC with Terraform, Jenkins.

    We hire people not to a project, but to the company. If the project (or your work in it) is over, you go to another project or to a paid ‚ÄúIdle‚Äù.

    Must have

    • 4+ years of experience in the IT industry
    • Strong experience in Azure cloud environment
    • Advanced experience with Terraform
    • Knowledge of Git and IaC concepts
    • Hands-on experience with Jenkins
    • Ability to work well with customers, self-manage through difficult situations, be focused on client needs
    • Good spoken English

    Would be a plus

    • Experience in working with AWS

    DataArt offers:

    • Professional Development:
      ‚Äî Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
      ‚Äî The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
      ‚Äî More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
      ‚Äî Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
      ‚Äî Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.

    • The ability to focus on your work: a lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement, and convenient corporate services;

    • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;

    • Flexible schedule (there are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues;

    • The ability to work in any of our development centers.


  44. DevOps (GCP) Engineer ("DataArt", –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...á–∞—Å—ã), –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é —Å –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥...

    About the vacancy

    DataArt –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è IT-–∫–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–æ–º –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –ü–û. –° 1997 –≥–æ–¥–∞ –º—ã –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º, –º–æ–¥–µ—Ä–Ω–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—é—Ç —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å—É –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤. DataArt –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞–ª—Å—è –∫–∞–∫ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥—Ä—É–∑–µ–π. –û—Ç—Å—é–¥–∞ ‚Äî –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—Å –æ—Ç –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö IT-–∞—É—Ç—Å–æ—Ä—Å–µ—Ä–æ–≤:

    ‚Äî –ü–ª–æ—Å–∫–∞—è —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞: –Ω–µ—Ç –ø—Ä—è–º—ã—Ö –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª—å–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∏ –ø–æ–¥—á–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö.

    ‚Äî –ú—ã –±–µ—Ä–µ–º –ª—é–¥–µ–π –Ω–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç, –∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é. –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –∑–∞–∫–æ–Ω—á–∏–ª–∞—Å—å, –≤—ã –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –≤ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –∏–ª–∏ –≤ –æ–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–π idle.

    ‚Äî –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –º–µ–Ω—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –∏–∑ –¥–æ–º–∞, –ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–µ–±—è –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–æ–ª—è—Ö.

    ‚Äî –ú–∏–Ω–∏–º—É–º –±—é—Ä–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏ –∏ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã.

    Must have

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ Google Cloud.
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Compute Engine, Kubernetes Engine: –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏, —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–µ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è: Cloud Storage, Cloud SQL.
    • –¢–µ–æ—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ \ –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–µ–π OSI –∏–ª–∏ TCP\IP.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è (—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è, –ø–æ–¥—Å–µ—Ç–∏, —à–ª—é–∑—ã).
    • –ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã–º–∏ —É—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç–∞–º–∏ (traceroute, ping, nmap, nslookup).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å \ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è CI-—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º (Teamcity, Azure DevOps\TFS, Travis CI, Gitlab CI).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: git, tfvc, subversion).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–æ–≤ –∫ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é –∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–¥–∞ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: gitflow).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–µ–ª—è—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–æ–≤–æ–º —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: C#, Java).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–≤ —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–∏ –∏ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.
    • –†–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π.

    Would be a plus

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: bash –∏–ª–∏ Powershell).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å App Engine.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ ¬´–æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö¬ª –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–æ–≤ (HTTP(S), DNS, TCP, ICMP).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏–ª–∏ —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–µ —Ç–µ–æ—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–∏ continuous delivery\continuous deployment.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, –≤ —á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ Agile\Scrum.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ\–æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å nosql.
    • –ü—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–∞—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ë–î –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è—Ö.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ \ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π (Ansible, Chef, etc).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏–º–ø–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, GCP Cloud Deployment Manager).
    • –ù–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–æ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–º cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP).

    DATAART –ü–†–ï–î–õ–ê–ì–ê–ï–¢:

    • –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ:
      - –û–ø—ã—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∏ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è–º–∏.
      - –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –º–µ–Ω—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã, —Å—Ç–µ–∫, –ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–µ–±—è –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–æ–ª—è—Ö.
      - –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ 150 –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–≤–∞–ª–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏.
      - –ò–∑—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ: –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã, –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∞–º–∏ –∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∏–∑ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω.
      - –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥—á–∏–∫–æ–≤, –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—é—â–∏—Ö –Ω–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏—è—Ö –∏ –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∞—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤.
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–æ—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ: –æ—Ç—Å—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ –±—é—Ä–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏ –∏ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã.
    • –î—Ä—É–∂–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –∞—Ç–º–æ—Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–∞, –∑–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –æ –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–µ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤.
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ (–µ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏—Å—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —á–∞—Å—ã), –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é —Å –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∞–º–∏.
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –ª—é–±–æ–º –Ω–∞—à–µ–º —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏.


  45. DevOps with Cloud Security Experience, Fintech Solutions ("DataArt", –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...re are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues; The ability t...

    About the vacancy

    Our client is a successful fintech start-up based in London.

    The client is expanding its cloud engineering group (team of 5 DevOps), and is now looking for a talented and motivated DevOps with Cloud Security experience (Team of 2-3 Engineers).

    The Cloud Security Engineer is expected to perform various functions, including actively contributing to the overall implementation of security cloud architecture in the company.

    DevOps team helps to improve and develop new designs and security strategies across all types of cloud-based applications (including infrastructure, platform, and software as a service).

    The company is growing very rapidly, but remains a small company in which engineers are required to contribute to many aspects of their departments‚Äô roles in the wider business.

    The rate of change is very fast, and this role would be good for technologically skilled enthusiasts who want to develop their skills further more since our client is able to provide enough space for professional growth.

    Main project stack, but not limited to AWS, Terraform, ELK stack, Gitlab CI/CD, Docker.

    Must have

    • Communication skills
    • The ability to ‚Äúget things done‚Äù in a flexible dynamic organization without having to rely on line management authority over other team members
    • Automation and CI/CD pipelines
    • Infrastructure as code such as Terraform
    • Implementing security features in AWS, Azure or GCP (AWS is a big plus)
    • Deep Experience in at least one of the following areas: Network Security, Host/System Security, Identity access management, Cryptography
    • Proven track record as a Cloud Security Engineer within a commercial environment

    Would be a plus

    • Team-oriented person with excellent written and verbal communication skills and are able to talk easily to people at all levels
    • Good organizational skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-moving, dynamic environment
    • Working in a regulated sector: PCI-DSS, CIS baseline, ISO 27001, ISAE 3402/SOC II controls

    DATAART OFFERS:

    • Professional Development:
      ‚Äî Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
      ‚Äî The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
      ‚Äî More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
      ‚Äî Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
      ‚Äî Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.

    • The ability to focus on your work: a lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement, and convenient corporate services;

    • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;

    • Flexible schedule (there are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues;

    • The ability to work in any of our development centers.


  46. Lead DevOps Engineer with AWS Experience ("DataArt", –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...re are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues; The ability t...

    About the vacancy

    This London-based client is one of the world's most established stock exchanges. DataArt is working with multiple business units, helping the customer to re-architect key aspects of its data infrastructure and business applications, including taking them to the cloud. Our scope of engagement includes modern frontend development, data streaming, data warehousing, modern APIs, and other areas.

    You will be working in a team of highly skilled engineers and hands-on architects. All team members, including project managers, are hands-on, with a technical background.

    Tech stack of the project: Java, Amazon Cloud, Angular 2+, Oracle, Snowflake.

    Must have

    • 3+ years of DevOps experience or cloud architecture
    • Team management experience
    • Fundamental knowledge of basic AWS services
    • Experience with CI/CD/CT architecture
    • Knowledge of Git and IaC concepts
    • Experience in end-to-end testing
    • Experience working with toolchain discussions/approvals, operational acceptance
    • Hands-on experience with Terraform
    • Spoken English

    Would be a plus

    • Experience in working with multi-account environments in AWS

    DataArt offers:

    • Professional Development:
      ‚Äî Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
      ‚Äî The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
      ‚Äî More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
      ‚Äî Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
      ‚Äî Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.

    • The ability to focus on your work: a lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement, and convenient corporate services;

    • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;

    • Flexible schedule (there are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues;

    • The ability to work in any of our development centers.


  47. DevOps (Azure) Engineer ("DataArt", –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...á–∞—Å—ã), –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é —Å –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥...

    About the vacancy

    DataArt –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è IT-–∫–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–æ–º –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –ü–û. –° 1997 –≥–æ–¥–∞ –º—ã –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º, –º–æ–¥–µ—Ä–Ω–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—é—Ç —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å—É –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤. DataArt –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞–ª—Å—è –∫–∞–∫ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥—Ä—É–∑–µ–π. –û—Ç—Å—é–¥–∞ ‚Äî –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—Å –æ—Ç –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö IT-–∞—É—Ç—Å–æ—Ä—Å–µ—Ä–æ–≤:

    ‚Äî –ü–ª–æ—Å–∫–∞—è —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞: –Ω–µ—Ç –ø—Ä—è–º—ã—Ö –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª—å–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∏ –ø–æ–¥—á–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö.

    ‚Äî –ú—ã –±–µ—Ä–µ–º –ª—é–¥–µ–π –Ω–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç, –∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é. –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –∑–∞–∫–æ–Ω—á–∏–ª–∞—Å—å, –≤—ã –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –≤ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –∏–ª–∏ –≤ –æ–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–π idle.

    ‚Äî –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –º–µ–Ω—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –∏–∑ –¥–æ–º–∞, –ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–µ–±—è –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–æ–ª—è—Ö.

    ‚Äî –ú–∏–Ω–∏–º—É–º –±—é—Ä–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏ –∏ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã.

    Must have

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ Azure.
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Azure VM: –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤—â–∏–∫–∏ –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏, auto-scaling.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è (—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è, –ø–æ–¥—Å–µ—Ç–∏, —à–ª—é–∑—ã).
    • –ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã–º–∏ —É—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç–∞–º–∏ (traceroute, ping, nmap, nslookup.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è: Azure File Storage, Blob Storage, etc.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è Azure RM: —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–Ω—ã–µ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã, SG.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å \ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è CI-—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: Teamcity, Azure DevOps\TFS, Travis CI, Gitlab CI).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: git, tfvc, subversion).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–æ–≤ –∫ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é –∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–¥–∞ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: gitflow).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–µ–ª—è—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–æ–≤–æ–º —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: C#, Java).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–≤ —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–∏ –∏ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.
    • –†–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π.

    Would be a plus

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: bash –∏–ª–∏ Powershell).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Azure SQL.
    • –¢–µ–æ—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ/ –∏–ª–∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–µ–π OSI –∏–ª–∏ TCP\IP.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ ¬´–æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö¬ª –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–æ–≤ (HTTP(S), DNS, TCP, ICMP.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç\—Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–µ —Ç–µ–æ—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–∏ continuous delivery\continuous deployment.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, –≤ —á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ Agile\Scrum.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ\–æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å NoSQL.
    • –ü—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–∞—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –ë–î –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è—Ö.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ \ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π (Ansible, Chef, etc).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏–º–ø–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, —à–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω—ã Azure RM).
    • –ù–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–æ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–º cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP).

    DATAART –ü–†–ï–î–õ–ê–ì–ê–ï–¢:

    • –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ:
      - –û–ø—ã—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∏ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è–º–∏.

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–æ—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ: –æ—Ç—Å—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ –±—é—Ä–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏ –∏ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã.

    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ (–µ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏—Å—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —á–∞—Å—ã), –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é —Å –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∞–º–∏.

  48. Senior DevOps Engineer, Transport Booking System ("DataArt", –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...re are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues; The ability t...

    About the vacancy

    The client creates technological solutions for the land passenger transport market. The company‚Äôs main development center is located in Berlin, and its solutions are used in several dozen countries around the world. The service which DataArt is helping to develop connects passengers and drivers via a mobile application and an online portal. A flexible API allows the service to integrate with other travel systems, linking the client‚Äôs service with partner websites and booking tools.

    DataArt‚Äôs specialists helped integrate travel services as well as updated and optimized the product‚Äôs internal systems (microservice architecture). DataArt developed a notifications mechanism that supports various devices. –°urrently, our main focus is back on integration with external services.

    We hire people not to a project, but to the company. If the project (or your work in it) is over, you go to another project or to a paid ‚ÄúIdle‚Äù.

    Must have

    • 5+ years of experience in system administration and configuration
    • Experience in Linux administration and automation, shell scripting
    • Experience in software development (Go or Python)
    • Familiarity with DevSecOps and SRE approaches and practices
    • Knowledge and understanding of networking, DNS, and proxies
    • Experience creating and operating Docker containers in a Kubernetes environment
    • Experience with handling infrastructure via code and CI/CD
    • Familiarity with security best practices in regards to servers or containers
    • Experience working with AWS services (load balancers, S3, RDS, CloudFormation, CloudFront)
    • Troubleshooting, bug scoping, and good problem-solving skills
    • Good spoken English

    Would be a plus

    • Experience with Terraform and/or Ansible
    • Familiarity with Agile methodologies
    • Experience with any of these CI/CD solutions: TravisCI, DroneCI, Gitlab, CircleCI, Jenkins

    DataArt offers:

    • Professional Development:
      ‚Äî Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
      ‚Äî The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
      ‚Äî More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
      ‚Äî Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
      ‚Äî Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.

    • The ability to focus on your work: a lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement, and convenient corporate services;

    • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;

    • Flexible schedule (there are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues;

    • The ability to work in any of our development centers.

    –û –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ:

    • –£—é—Ç–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ 8 –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç–∞—Ö —Ö–æ–¥—å–±—ã –æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ –ë–∞—É–º–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∞—è. –†—è–¥–æ–º —Ñ—É–¥–∫–æ—Ä—Ç, –≥–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Ä–º—ã, –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–µ –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∫–∞—Ñ–µ –∏ –º–∞–≥–∞–∑–∏–Ω–æ–≤.

  51. DevOps Tech Lead ("FUSION CORE", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ... (–Ω–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ). –ö–ª–∞—Å—Å–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤ –∏ –Ω–µ...

    FUSION CORE ‚Äî –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ –±—Ä–∞—É–∑–µ—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–≥—Ä, –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –≤ 2015 –≥–æ–¥—É –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π —Å –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–ª–µ—Ç–Ω–∏–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º –≤ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–≤–æ–π –∏–Ω–¥—É—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–∏. –ì–ª–∞–≤–Ω—ã–º —Ñ–æ–∫—É—Å–æ–º –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏—Ö MMO –∏–≥—Ä –≤ –∂–∞–Ω—Ä–µ 4x strategy, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–∞–º –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–º—É –º–∏—Ä—É.

    –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∞–º–∏ DevOps –Ω–∞—à–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞ –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –ª–∏–¥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à—É—é DevOps-–∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É.

    –ó–∞–¥–∞—á–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç —Ä–µ—à–∞—Ç—å:

    • –ó–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è Provision, Monitor Infrastructure, Secure, Deploy.

    • –û–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å, —Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, —Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –Ω–∞ devops-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤; –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç.

    • –û—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –ø–ª–∞–Ω –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è; –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω—ã DevOps.

    • –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏—á–∏–Ω—ã –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ –∏ –∏–Ω—Ü–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤.

    –î–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –ø–æ–Ω–∞–¥–æ–±–∏—Ç—Å—è:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö - –æ—Ç 3 –ª–µ—Ç.

    • –≠–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux.

    • –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç IaC (Ansible) –≤ production.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker –≤ production.

    • –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π: routing, bridging, firewall,..

    • –°–∞–º–æ–æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è; –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—ã—Ç—å —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–º.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á - –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –ø–æ SRE - –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ - –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –æ—á–µ–Ω—å –∫—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏:

    • –¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ / –º–∞—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å PostgreSQL; –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ - –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —Ä–µ–ø–ª–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –±–µ–∫–∞–ø–æ–≤, –∞–ø–≥—Ä–µ–π–¥ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–∏.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Terraform, HashiCorp Vault, Nginx, Redis, Kafka, Filebeat, Zookeeper, ClickHouse.

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —à–∞–≥–æ–≤–æ–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –æ—Ç –º. –°–æ–∫–æ–ª (–Ω–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ).
    • –ö–ª–∞—Å—Å–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤ –∏ –Ω–µ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –æ–±—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞.
    • –ù–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –≤ —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ.
    • –ö–æ—Ñ–µ, —Ñ—Ä—É–∫—Ç—ã, —Å–Ω–µ–∫–∏ –∏ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–≤–∞—è –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∞ –≤ –∑–æ–Ω–µ –æ—Ç–¥—ã—Ö–∞, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –µ–∂–µ–º–µ—Å—è—á–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä–∏–Ω–∫–∏.
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è (–∫–Ω–∏–≥–∏, –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã, –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –º–∏—Ç–∞–ø—ã) –∑–∞ —Å—á–µ—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏.
    • 100% –∫–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –±–æ–ª—å–Ω–∏—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ.
    • –†–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ 3 –º–µ—Å—è—Ü–∞ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∞.
    • –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§.
    • –ì—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: 10:00 - 19:00.


  52. –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä –ø–æ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ DEVOPS (Data) ("–ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω", –ù–æ–≤–æ—Å–∏–±–∏—Ä—Å–∫) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...—Ñ–∏–∫ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ; –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç - –ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–ª–∏—Å –¥–...

    ¬´–ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω¬ª —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å ‚Äì –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π. –í 2020 –º—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–ª–∏ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–Ω—É—é —Ä–µ—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é –∏ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–µ–±—è —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç—ã:

    • –¢–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º –∏ —Å–≤—è–∑—å - –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—É—é –º—ã –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∞–º–∏.
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã—Ö –ò–¢-–∫–æ–º–ø–µ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏. –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–ª–∏ –∏–Ω—Å–æ—Ä—Å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º.
    • –ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç –≤ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–µ. –í—Å–µ, —á—Ç–æ –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º, –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º –¥–ª—è –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–≥–æ (—Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∏) –∏–ª–∏ –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–µ–≥–æ (–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω)
    • –ü—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ –∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –ø–æ Agile. –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ ‚Äì –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–ª–µ—Ü —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞–µ—Ç –∑–∞ –≤—Å–µ –µ–≥–æ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏, –Ω–µ –≤–∞–∂–Ω—ã—Ö —á–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π –Ω–µ—Ç.

    –ú—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏–º —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—É—é data-driven –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é, –∏ —Ç—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—à—å –Ω–∞–º –≤ —ç—Ç–æ–º –ø–æ–º–æ—á—å.

    –†–æ–ª—å –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ –ø–æ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (DEVOPS) –≤ –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏:

    • —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ, –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—é—â–µ–π—Å—è –æ–¥–Ω–æ–π –∏–∑ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö –∏ –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏—á–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—é—â–∏—Ö—Å—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º BigData –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏. –ü–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ —à–∏—Ä–æ–∫–æ–º —Å—Ç–µ–∫–µ open source —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π, —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç forward-thinking –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∞ –ø–æ—ç—Ç–æ–º—É –µ—Å–ª–∏ —Ç—ã –Ω–µ –∑–Ω–∞–µ—à—å –∞–±—Å–æ–ª—é—Ç–Ω–æ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –∏–∑ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π ‚Äì —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—à–Ω–æ, –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–±—É—á–∞—Ç—å—Å—è, —É–∑–Ω–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤–æ–µ –∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å –º–∏—Ä –≤–æ–∫—Ä—É–≥ —Å–µ–±—è –¥–ª—è –Ω–∞—Å –≤–∞–∂–Ω–µ–µ;
    • –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–µ–∫—Å–∞ BigData;
    • –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤;
    • –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ DevOps –∏ SRE —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –≥–∞—Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞ –æ—Ç —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–µ–∫—Å–∞, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–µ–≥–æ state-of-the-art —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ –∏ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –ë–æ–ª—å—à–∏–º–∏ –î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏, –¥–∞—é—â–∏–º–∏ –∫–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –Ω–∞ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–µ.

    –ú—ã —Ä–∞—Å—Å—á–∏—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ —É —Ç–µ–±—è –µ—Å—Ç—å –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∏ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —ç—Ç–æ–π –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–∏:

    • Linux –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞;
    • Bash, —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ä—É—Ç–∏–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã —Å –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤;
    • –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ –∏ —Å–±–æ—Ä –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫ –¥–ª—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Å—Ä–µ–¥—ã.

    –ú—ã –±—É–¥–µ–º —Ä–∞–¥—ã, –µ—Å–ª–∏ –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ —Ç—ã –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–µ—à—å:

    • –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–µ–º –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Ansible;
    • –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–µ –∞–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ–ø—Ü–∏–π CI/CD (GitLabCI, Jenkins, etc.);
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–º Hadoop;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –ø–æ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é DevOps\SRE;
    • –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–∞ Infrastructure as code –∏ —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º —Å –ª—é–±–æ–π –∏–∑ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è–º–∏.

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω–æ–º—É –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç—É –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –±–æ–Ω—É—Å—ã:

    • –°–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ ‚Äì –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è —É –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –¥–µ–ª–∞
    • –£–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ ‚Äì –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç —Ç–µ–±–µ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ–µ –ü–û –∏ –º–æ—â–Ω—ã–π –Ω–æ—É—Ç–±—É–∫.
    • –°–≤–æ–±–æ–¥–∞ - Beefree - –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ;
    • –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç - –ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–ª–∏—Å –¥–æ–±—Ä–æ–≤–æ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–º –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç–æ–º –æ–ø—Ü–∏–π –∏ —Å–ª—É–∂–µ–±–Ω–∞—è —Å–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∞—è —Å–≤—è–∑—å.

    –ü—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω—è–π—Å—è –∫ –ª—É—á—à–µ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ –ø–æ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (DEVOPS)!

    –í –ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω –º—ã —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—É—é –∏ –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—á—É—é —Å—Ä–µ–¥—É. –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ —Å–æ–±–ª—é–¥–∞–µ—Ç –ö–æ–¥–µ–∫—Å –ø–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è, –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –¥–µ–ª–æ–≤–æ–π —ç—Ç–∏–∫–∏. –ú—ã –ø–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞–µ–º —á–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ –∏ —ç—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ –∫–∞–∫ –ø–æ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏—é –∫ –¥—Ä—É–≥ –¥—Ä—É–≥—É, —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –∫ –Ω–∞—à–∏–º –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏–º –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–∞–º.


  53. Devops engineer ("–ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...—Ñ–∏–∫ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ; –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç - –ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–ª–∏—Å –¥–...

    ¬´–ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω¬ª —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å ‚Äì –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π. –í 2020 –º—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–ª–∏ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–Ω—É—é —Ä–µ—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é –∏ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–µ–±—è —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç—ã:

    • –¢–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º –∏ —Å–≤—è–∑—å - –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—É—é –º—ã –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∞–º–∏.
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã—Ö –ò–¢-–∫–æ–º–ø–µ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏. –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–ª–∏ –∏–Ω—Å–æ—Ä—Å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º.
    • –ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç –≤ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–µ. –í—Å–µ, —á—Ç–æ –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º, –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º –¥–ª—è –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–≥–æ (—Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∏) –∏–ª–∏ –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–µ–≥–æ (–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω)
    • –ü—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ –∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –ø–æ Agile. –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ ‚Äì –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–ª–µ—Ü —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞–µ—Ç –∑–∞ –≤—Å–µ –µ–≥–æ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏, –Ω–µ –≤–∞–∂–Ω—ã—Ö —á–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π –Ω–µ—Ç.

    –ú—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏–º —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—É—é data-driven –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é, –∏ —Ç—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—à—å –Ω–∞–º –≤ —ç—Ç–æ–º –ø–æ–º–æ—á—å.

    –í —Ä–æ–ª–∏er Devops enginer, —Ç—ã –±—É–¥–µ—à—å —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª–∏—Ç –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ –∏ —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤.

    –í —Ç–≤–æ—é —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä—É –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –≤–æ–π–¥—É—Ç:

    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª–∏—Ç –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ –∏ —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤;
    • –í–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏ (k8s, OKD) –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;
    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ pipeline‚Äô–æ–≤, –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ CI/CD –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º, –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π.

    –ú—ã —Ä–∞—Å—Å—á–∏—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ —Ç—ã –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–µ—à—å —ç—Ç–∏–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º –∏ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∞–º–∏:

    • –í–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ–¥–Ω–∏–º –∏–∑ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Python, Groovy;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã (–±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞, –ø—Ä–æ–∫—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Ç.–¥.);
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ (—Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã, VPN, TLS/SSL);
    • –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Linux –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 4-—Ö –ª–µ—Ç;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Jenkins, –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö pipeline‚Äôs;
    • –ë–æ–≥–∞—Ç—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ Ansible;
    • –ë–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–¥–∞ –∏ –∞—Ä—Ç–µ—Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤ gitlab/nexus/harbor;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π (LXC, LXD);
    • –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ (Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π (Kubernetes, Docker);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ —Ä–µ–ø–ª–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏.

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω–æ–º—É –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç—É –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –±–æ–Ω—É—Å—ã:

    • –°–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ ‚Äì –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è —É –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –¥–µ–ª–∞
    • –£–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ ‚Äì –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç —Ç–µ–±–µ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ–µ –ü–û –∏ –º–æ—â–Ω—ã–π –Ω–æ—É—Ç–±—É–∫.
    • –ö–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–æ—Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤–æ–π –±–æ–Ω—É—Å.
    • –°–≤–æ–±–æ–¥–∞ - Beefree - –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ;
    • –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç - –ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–ª–∏—Å –¥–æ–±—Ä–æ–≤–æ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–º –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç–æ–º –æ–ø—Ü–∏–π –∏ —Å–ª—É–∂–µ–±–Ω–∞—è —Å–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∞—è —Å–≤—è–∑—å.

    –ü—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω—è–π—Å—è –∫ –ª—É—á—à–µ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ Devops engineer!


  54. DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä ("Paysend", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...–≤—Å–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –º—ã –æ—Ç–¥—ã—Ö–∞–µ–º); —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏–ª–∏ –∞—Ç–º–æ—Å—Ñ...

    –ú—ã ‚Äì PaySend –∏ –†–æ–±–æ–∫–∞—Å—Å–∞!

    PaySend - –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–∞—è —Ñ–∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ö-–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è, —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º—è—â–∞—è—Å—è –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –¥–µ–Ω–µ–≥ –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–º—É –º–∏—Ä—É. –ú—ã —Å—Ç–∞–ª–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–º–∏ –≤ —Ñ–∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ö-–æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–∏, –∫–æ–º—É —É–¥–∞–ª–æ—Å—å –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥–æ–≤ —Å –∫–∞—Ä—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ –∫–∞—Ä—Ç—É, —Ç–µ–º —Å–∞–º—ã–º –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª–∏–≤ –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –¥–µ–Ω—å–≥–∏ –º–µ–∂–¥—É 12 –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–∞—Ä–¥–∞–º–∏ –∫–∞—Ä—Ç –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–º—É –º–∏—Ä—É ‚Äî Mastercard, Visa, China UnionPay –∏ –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–º–∏ –º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–ª–∞—Ç–µ–∂–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. –°–≤—ã—à–µ 2 –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ —á–µ–º 90 —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞—Ö –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—Ç –Ω–∞—à–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã.

    –†–æ–±–æ–∫–∞—Å—Å–∞ (–¥–æ—á–µ—Ä–Ω—è—è –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è PaySend) - —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç –ø—Ä–∏—ë–º–∞ –∏ –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω-–ø–ª–∞—Ç–µ–∂–µ–π –¥–ª—è –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –∏ –ö–∞–∑–∞—Ö—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞. –ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –†–æ–±–æ–∫–∞—Å—Å—ã —è–≤–ª—è—é—Ç—Å—è –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 60000 –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π, —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∏ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –º–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ –∏ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞, –≥–æ—Å—É–¥–∞—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –∏–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏.

    –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—É—Ç–∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –∏ –∑–∞ —Ä—É–±–µ–∂–æ–º, –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ–º –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã. –ò —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º –Ω–∞–º –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É DevOps.

    –ß–µ–º –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:

    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤, –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—è—â–∏—Ö—Å—è –∫ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫—É, –æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞—è –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å –ø—Ä–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä–µ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º, –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤;
    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —É—Å–ª—É–≥ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ä–µ–¥–µ, –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—å –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –ª–∞—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –æ–±—â–µ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã;
    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;
    • –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –Ω–∞–¥ —Ä–∞—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏–Ω—Ü–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤, —Å–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –≥—Ä–∞–º–æ—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö postmortem, –∏ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–º—É —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏—é —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –≤—ã–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞;
    • –í–æ–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤ –≤–µ—Å—å –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ü–∏–∫–ª —É—Å–ª—É–≥ - –æ—Ç —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –¥–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏;

    –ú—ã –±—ã —Ö–æ—Ç–µ–ª–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –Ω–∞—à –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç:

    • –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–ª Linux –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ —É–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;
    • –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–ª –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Docker, Kubernetes;
    • –∏–º–µ–ª –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞: Prometheus, Grafana, Zabbix;
    • –∏–º–µ–ª –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å MS IIS;
    • –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤—ã —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ TCP/IP, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã web —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (nginx), —á—Ç–æ —Ç–∞–∫–æ–µ smtp, http –∏ —Ç.–¥.

    –ü—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç—Å—è:

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –ë–î (MongoDB, PostgreSQL);
    • –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–µ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ë–î;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π python;

    –ì–∞—Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º:

    • –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Ä–æ—Å—Ç –≤ —Ñ–∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ö–µ;
    • –æ—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;
    • –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ 5/2 (—Å—É–±–±–æ—Ç–∞, –≤–æ—Å–∫—Ä–µ—Å–µ–Ω—å–µ –∏ –≤—Å–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –º—ã –æ—Ç–¥—ã—Ö–∞–µ–º);
    • —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏–ª–∏ –∞—Ç–º–æ—Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤—ã (–Ω–∞ –≤–∞—à –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä);
    • –ª–æ—è–ª—å–Ω–∞—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –æ—Ç–ø—É—Å–∫–æ–≤;
    • –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ (–ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –∑–∞ —Å—á–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–æ–¥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è);
    • –º–∞—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å –æ—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –ø–æ –æ—Å–æ–±—ã–º —Å–ª—É—á–∞—è–º (–±—Ä–∞–∫, —Ä–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–µ—Ç–µ–π –∏ –ø—Ä.);
    • –µ–∂–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏—è.


  55. Senior DevOps Engineer ("–ò–∑–∏–±—Ä—ç–π–Ω", –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...h a terrace and great coffee, cookies, and fruit (remote work during COVID-19)....

    Easybrain develops mobile games and applications that millions of people around the world play every day. Currently, we are looking for a highly motivated, responsible individual with a great experience in DevOps/System Engineering to ensure the quality and continuous functional safety and security.

    Responsibilities:

    • Build and maintain server infrastructure;
    • Monitor, troubleshoot and resolve issues in our dev/test/production environments;
    • Automate deployment and delivery processes (CD/CI).

    Requirements:

    • 3+ years‚Äô experience in DevOps position;
    • Experience with Linux containers, cgroups, namespaces etc.;
    • Docker & LXC architecture knowledge;
    • Experience with at least one configuration management system, like Ansible/Chef/Puppet;
    • Experience with modern monitoring systems - Zabbix, Graphite/Grafana;
    • Experience with building CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins;
    • Experience with RDMBs, MySQL and PostgreSQL configuring, optimizing and troubleshooting;
    • Good experience with distributed web/REST systems;
    • Good bash scripting skills;
    • Experience with source control management, like Git as well as deployment and contributing code flows;
    • English language proficiency (intermediate level or higher).

    Optional Requirements:

    • Experience with Puppet;
    • Experience with Yandex ClickHouse;
    • NoSQL and distributed data systems knowledge will be a plus;
    • Log collection and analyzing experience, ELK stack knowledge;
    • Familiar with microservice architecture;
    • Python programming/automation skills;
    • AWS or other clouds API automation experience.

    Benefits:

    Besides the engaging tasks, support from experienced colleagues, and the opportunity to realize your own ideas, challenge, and drive, we offer:

    • Work on the best products in the niche;
    • High income with performance bonuses;
    • Sports reimbursement;
    • English lessons;
    • Medical insurance;
    • A fancy office in the center of Minsk, with a terrace and great coffee, cookies, and fruit (remote work during COVID-19).


  56. DevOps Engineer, MS Azure ("Star", –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫) [ 2021-05-07 ]

    The Opportunity

    Our customer is a global leader in the design and manufacturing of analog, mixed-signal, and DSP integrated circuits to help solve the toughest engineering challenges. The company serves clients in the industrial, automotive, consumer, and communications markets through a direct sales force, third-party distributors, and independent sales representatives in the United States as well as the rest of North and South America, Europe, Japan, China, and the rest of Asia.

    The project has a goal is to build a Developer Platform for an Integrated Circuits product line that will enable developers to simulate use cases of HW + SW in a virtual environment. The platform allows electronics engineers to design and validate various real HW configurations and track signal‚Äôs evolution within the virtualized environment. The project scope includes all types of development activities from the UX design to the production roll-out for real users.

    You

    Essential skills:

    • Strong Linux/Unix administration skills;
    • Software lifecycle management experience;
    • Networking fundamentals (switching, routing, load balancing);
    • Versioning (Git, SVN, etc.);
    • Scripting/programming skills (Bash, Python/Ruby, etc.);
    • Monitoring tools (Grafana, Prometheus, etc.);
    • Log analytics (ELK stack, Sumologic, Splunk, etc.);
    • Cloud computing (MS Azure);
    • Understanding the containerisation concepts (Docker ecosystem);
    • Experience with relational DBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.);
    • Excellent written communication and the ability to communicate verbally with the customer (English);
    • Bachelor‚Äôs degree (or equivalent work experience).

    DevOps skills:

    • Continuous Integration/Delivery (Jenkins pipelines, GitLab CI, BitBucket etc.);
    • Artifacts management system (Artifactory, Nexus);
    • Configuration management (Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Salt, etc.);
    • Cloud configuration, IaaC (Terraform, ARM templates etc.).

    Bonus skills:

    • Practice experience with second cloud platform (AWS Cloud, GCP);
    • Experience with container orchestration systems in Azure (Azure Kubernetes Service);
    • NoSQL DB knowledge (Redis, Memcached, MongoDB, Cassandra, etc.);
    • Understanding of Distributed Systems concepts, High Availability, vertical and horizontal scalability.

    Compensation and Benefits

    Star offers a competitive and rewarding salary and benefits package as well as an intellectually and creatively stimulating work environment. You will find professional flexibility, new ways of working and unique international travel opportunities.

    Official employment due to Belorussian labour law


  57. –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–π –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä / DevOps ("–ì—Ä—É–ø–ø–∞ –¢–µ–ª–µ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∫–∞-–û–¥–∏–Ω", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2021-05-07 ]
    ...Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å, –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ 5/2, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–∞ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞; –£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –¥–æ—Ö–æ–¥–∞ –...

    –° —á–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å:

    • –í—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã 24—Ö7, —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã (Linux, docker, –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è) ‚Äì –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–∏–π –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç 5 –ø–æ—Ö–æ–∂–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ç–µ–Ω–¥–æ–≤;
    • 200+ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (RHEL/Centos 7);
    • RabbitMQ, Redis, Postgres, MongoDB, Docker, Nginx;
    • Prometheus, Grafana.

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux (Centos, RHEL), –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π –¥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–±—É—Ç–∏–≤–æ–≤;
    • –°–≤–æ–±–æ–¥–Ω–æ–µ –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ Linux, bash;
    • –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (—Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, RAID, LVM, NFS, iSCSI);
    • –¢—Ä–∞–±–ª—à—É—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è (docker, –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –º–∞—à–∏–Ω –∏ –¥–∏—Å–∫–æ–≤–æ–π –ø–æ–¥—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, —Å–µ—Ç–∏);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–æ–ª–µ–π –¥–ª—è ansible;
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ (Zabbix, Prometheus);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ VPN —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ site2site —Ç—É–Ω–Ω–µ–ª–µ–π;
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∞—Å—Å–∏–º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏—á–Ω–æ–π –∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∏, –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å PKI –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–æ–π;
    • –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –≤ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–µ –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ VMware vSphere;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker;
    • –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å IP —Ç–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω–∏–µ–π (Asterisk);
    • –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ª—é–±—ã–º —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    • –û—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ —à—Ç–∞—Ç, –≤ —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–∏ —Å –¢–ö –†–§;
    • –ü–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å, –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ 5/2, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–∞ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞;
    • –£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –¥–æ—Ö–æ–¥–∞ –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤ —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–∏ —Å –∫–≤–∞–ª–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–∞;
    • –†–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏ –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞;
    • –û—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ 5 –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç–∞—Ö —Ö–æ–¥—å–±—ã –æ—Ç –º. –ê–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–≤–æ–¥—Å–∫–∞—è.

    –ü—Ä–æ—Å—å–±–∞ —É–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ–º—ã–π —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –¥–æ—Ö–æ–¥–∞, –µ—Å–ª–∏ —ç—Ç–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –Ω–µ—Ç –≤ —Ä–µ–∑—é–º–µ.

    –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏:

    –ú—ã —è–≤–ª—è–µ–º—Å—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –†–ù–ò–°, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è:

    • –ü—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç –≤ —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ —Å 20–∫ —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ –Ω–∞–≤–∏–≥–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ—Ç–æ–π ~1 —Ä–∞–∑ –≤ 15 —Å–µ–∫—É–Ω–¥, –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç –∏—Ö –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É (—Ä–∞—Å—á–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫, –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä –ø—Ä–æ–±–µ–≥–æ–≤; —Å–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–æ–≤–æ–π —Ç—Ä–∞–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –∏ —Ç–∞–π–º–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥–≤–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å —Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏) –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ –æ–±—ä–µ–º–∞ –∏ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–∞–º–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –ù–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è 6 –∏–Ω—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Å–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã (–≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è SaaS), –≤ 2021 –≥–æ–¥—É –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤–≤–æ–¥ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–º –µ—â–µ 2-4 –∏–Ω—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Å–∞;
    • –ó–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ —è–≤–ª—è—é—Ç—Å—è –≥–æ—Å—É–¥–∞—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –≤–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π.


  58. DevOps Engineer with AWS Experience, Media Conglomerate ("DataArt", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) [ 2021-05-07 ]

    About the vacancy

    DataArt is involved in the software transformation of key business areas of a US-based global music conglomerate.

    The solutions we‚Äôre currently developing affect various aspects of recording studios: tour organization, merchandising, management of licenses and rights, and analytical tools.

    DataArt has developed a platform that allows you to reuse functional units and thereby reduce the cost of creating and supporting applications.

    We hire people not to a project, but to the company. If the project (or your work in it) is over, you go to another project or to a paid ‚ÄúIdle‚Äù.

    Must have

    • Experience working with large systems deployed on the cloud
    • Knowledge of AWS techniques and technologies (ASGs, VPCs, access control, security management)
    • Experience implementing CI/CD
    • Experience working with Ansible
    • Experience with non-relational databases (preferably Cassandra)
    • Knowledge of Linux
    • Good spoken English

    Would be a plus

    • AWS certification

    DataArt offers

    • Professional Development:
      ‚Äî Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
      ‚Äî The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
      ‚Äî More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
      ‚Äî Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
      ‚Äî Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.

    • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;

    • Flexible schedule (there are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues;

    • The ability to work in any of our development centers.

    You will be working in a flexible and dynamic Agile team.

    The technologies that are used are Java, Spring Boot, microservices, and Git.

    We are looking for an experienced DevOps engineer who is passionate about technology, has an analytical mindset, and is able to think out of the box.

    • Knowledge of the software development lifecycle
    • Hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes
    • Self-motivated and driven to learn new technologies
    • Extensive analytical and problem-solving skills
    • Great communication skills
    • Spoken English

    • Experience in a developer position
    • Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g. Ruby or Python)

    The Cloud Security Engineer is expected to perform various functions, including actively contributing to the overall implementation of security cloud architecture in the company.

    DevOps team helps to improve and develop new designs and security strategies across all types of cloud-based applications (including infrastructure, platform, and software as a service).

    The company is growing very rapidly, but remains a small company in which engineers are required to contribute to many aspects of their departments‚Äô roles in the wider business.

    The rate of change is very fast, and this role would be good for technologically skilled enthusiasts who want to develop their skills further more since our client is able to provide enough space for professional growth.

    Main project stack, but not limited to AWS, Terraform, ELK stack, Gitlab CI/CD, Docker.

    Must have

    • Communication skills

    • Automation and CI/CD pipelines
    • Infrastructure as code such as Terraform
    • Implementing security features in AWS, Azure or GCP (AWS is a big plus)
    • Deep Experience in at least one of the following areas: Network Security, Host/System Security, Identity access management, Cryptography
    • Proven track record as a Cloud Security Engineer within a commercial environment

    Would be a plus

    • Team-oriented person with excellent written and verbal communication skills and are able to talk easily to people at all levels
    • Good organizational skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-moving, dynamic environment
    • Working in a regulated sector: PCI-DSS, CIS baseline, ISO 27001, ISAE 3402/SOC II controls
